main event: A person observed a round, brilliant white light hovering in the sky over Wilkins P.D., Fairview, Pennsylvania, on July 22, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The object hovered briefly, then took off at a high rate of speed., The witness noted that the object moved behind clouds during the observation., No physical evidence of the object was left behind., The witness reported that no sound was heard during the sighting.
witness description: The witness provided a sketch and described the shape and behavior of the object.
